text: 90% Increased bone mineral density 90% Taurodontia 90% Woolly hair 90% Abnormality of frontal sinus 50% Abnormality of the fingernails 50% Abnormality of the ulna 50% Aplasia/Hypoplasia of the radius 50% Carious teeth 50% Delayed eruption of teeth 50% Delayed skeletal maturation 50% Dolichocephaly 50% Malar prominence 50% Round face 50% Abnormality of the hair - Abnormality of the mastoid - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Fragile nails - Microdontia - Widely spaced teeth - The Human Phenotype O
